backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing the backend for Heavenuse, including user profiles, family group management, memory posts, and group chat with access control and authorization mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Defines Old and New actor state types and a migration function that upgrades state by adding an empty messages map to support the new group chat feature.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (app rename, group chat, media gallery, display names) to their source files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of all frontend source files, serving as a reference index for the frontend codebase.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS stylesheet defining OKLCH-based design tokens for light and dark themes including background, primary, and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point with the page title set to 'Heavenuse' and a root div for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up TanStack Router with routes for feed, groups, and group chat pages, and handles authentication state and profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/CreateMemoryModa: Dialog form component for creating a new memory post with title, description, and image URL fields, including validation and submission via the createMemoryPost mutation.
frontend/src/components/GroupSelector.ts: A dropdown component that fetches all family groups and lets the user select one, displaying a loading skeleton while data is loading.
frontend/src/components/LandingPage.tsx: The public landing page for Heavenuse, showcasing a hero banner, feature cards (chat, media sharing, private groups), and sign-in buttons.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: The main authenticated app shell with a sticky header, desktop and mobile navigation (Memories, Groups, Chat), and an outlet for child routes.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: A button component that handles Internet Identity login and logout, showing a spinner during the login process and clearing the React Query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/MediaGallery.tsx: Displays a grid gallery of all image and video messages from a group chat, with loading skeletons and an empty state when no media exists.
frontend/src/components/MemoryCard.tsx: A scrapbook-styled card component that renders a single memory post with its image, title, description, author name, and formatted timestamp.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal dialog that prompts newly authenticated users to enter a display name before using the app, saving it via the profile mutation hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using the user's Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication, wrapping DFINITY's AuthClient to expose login, logout, and identity state with status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend interactions including user profiles, family groups, memory posts, and chat messages using the actor from useActor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet importing Google Fonts and defining Tailwind CSS base styles with a warm cream/terracotta design token system for both light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/FamilyGroupPage.tsx: Page for managing family groups, allowing users to create groups, add/remove members, view group details, and access media galleries and chat.
frontend/src/pages/FeedPage.tsx: Memory feed page that displays posts for a selected family group with group switching, skeleton loading states, and a modal for creating new memories.
frontend/src/pages/GroupChatPage.tsx: Real-time group chat page that renders message bubbles with text and media support, and allows sending and deleting messages within a specific family group.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with helpers to persist, retrieve, and clear those parameters via sessionStorage and history.replaceState.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining dark mode, custom fonts (serif, handwritten, body), an extended color palette using oklch CSS variables, custom shadows, border radii, and animation keyframes for a warm scrapbook-inspired theme.
project_state.json: Project state manifest for 'Heavenuse', a family communication app, tracking schema version, existing implemented features (auth, memory feed, group chat, theming, etc.), architectural notes, and known issues.
